sinks.name: Sink1
sinks.script:
sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['retailsalesreadyformodel.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> Sink1

typeProperties.script:
section Section1;
shared RetailSalesCSV = let
  AdfDoc = AzureStorage.BlobContents("https://makadf001.blob.core.windows.net/mycontainer/SampleData/RetailSales.csv"),
  Csv = Csv.Document(AdfDoc, [Delimiter = ",", Encoding = TextEncoding.Utf8, QuoteStyle = QuoteStyle.Csv]),
  PromotedHeaders = Table.PromoteHeaders(Csv, [PromoteAllScalars = true])
in
  PromotedHeaders;
shared RetailProductsCSV = let
  AdfDoc = AzureStorage.BlobContents("https://makadf001.blob.core.windows.net/mycontainer/SampleData/Products.csv"),
  Csv = Csv.Document(AdfDoc, [Delimiter = ",", Encoding = TextEncoding.Utf8, QuoteStyle = QuoteStyle.Csv]),
  PromotedHeaders = Table.PromoteHeaders(Csv, [PromoteAllScalars = true])
in
  PromotedHeaders;
shared UserQuery = let
  Source = RetailSalesCSV,
  #"Filtered rows" = Table.SelectRows(Source, each [advertising] = "1"),
  #"Changed column type" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(#"Filtered rows", {{"price", type number}})
in
  #"Changed column type";
